pages.text: $(italic)In your search for the perfect tool, you've found that the Enchanting Table often doesn't do your bidding. Using this highly modified Enchanting Table should resolve most of the issue you had with your original one.

pages.title: Spectrum Enchanting
pages.text: Place the item you want to enchant on the enchanter and all needed ingredients, like Enchanted Books, in the surrounding $(l:decoration/item_bowl)Item Bowls$(/l).

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: You can enhance the Enchanter with upgrades by placing them on the Gemstone Blocks.

pages.name: Enchanting Structure
pages.text: Switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best.
